sourcesContent:
<!-- ============================================================== -->
<!-- Simple four boxes Row -->
<!-- ============================================================== -->
<mat-card class="cardWithShadow">
    <mat-card-content>
      <input type='file' name="videoFile" (change)="onSelectFile($event)" accept="video/*"/>
      <button mat-flat-button color="primary" *ngIf="showVBtn" (click)="goToViewPage()">
        View
      </button>
      <!-- <video [src]="url" *ngIf="format==='video' && url" height="200" controls></video> -->
      <!-- <mat-card-title>Sample Page</mat-card-title>
      <mat-card-subtitle class="mat-body-1">This is test page</mat-card-subtitle> -->
    </mat-card-content>
  </mat-card>
